name: Lifetime Achievement Award
description: Recognizing exceptional career-long contributions and lasting impact in the business community.

description: Celebrating exemplary corporate leadership and strategic excellence.

description: Honoring young entrepreneurs who exemplify Christian values in business.

description: Celebrating outstanding women leaders making significant business impact.

description: Recognizing innovative new businesses showing exceptional growth potential.

name: Business Innovation & Technology Award
description: Honoring breakthrough innovation and technological advancement in business.

name: Best Family-Owned Business Award
description: Celebrating excellence in family-owned business operations and legacy.

name: Social Impact Award
description: Recognizing businesses making significant positive social contributions.

name: Small Basket Business Award
description: Honoring excellence in small-scale business operations and community impact.
